Account Charges.answerHtml:
Currently, opening a stocks account is completely free on Groww.

This may change in the near future. However, any change in account opening charge will be notified to all our users before implementing that update.
Account Charges.feedback: charges, prices, stocks charges, transaction charges, GST, maintenance charges, intraday charges, delivery charges, dp charges, square off charges, account opening charges, turnover, stamp duty,

Account Charges.answerHtml:
This is Rs 0 on Groww. 

Most platforms charge an annual maintenance charge (AMC) for the demat account. On Groww, we do not have any AMC.
Account Charges.feedback: charges, prices, stocks charges, transaction charges, GST, maintenance charges, intraday charges, delivery charges, dp charges, square off charges, account opening charges, turnover, stamp duty,

Transaction Charges.questionTitle: What is the charge for buy order (delivery)?
Transaction Charges.answerText:
Groww gives you the best stock investing experience at a low charge. 

STT Charges: 0.1% 
Exchange Transaction Charges: 0.00325% (NSE) or 0.003% (BSE) 
SEBI Turnover Charges: 0.00005% 
Stamp Duty: 0.015% 
Brokerage: Rs 20 or 0.05% per order (whichever is lower) 

Try our brokerage calculator to understand charges better. Press the button below to know more about our pricing.
Transaction Charges.feedback: charges, prices, stocks charges, transaction charges, delivery charges,

Transaction Charges.questionTitle: What is the charge for sell order (delivery)?
Transaction Charges.answerText:
Groww gives you the best stock investing experience at a low charge. 

STT Charges: 0.1% 
Exchange Transaction Charges: 0.00325% (NSE) or 0.003% (BSE) 
SEBI Turnover Charges: 0.00005% 
Stamp Duty: 0.015% 
Brokerage: Rs 20 or 0.05% per order (whichever is lower) 
DP charge: Rs.13.5 + 18% GST (per company per trading day)

Try our brokerage calculator to understand charges better. Press the button below to know more about our pricing.
Transaction Charges.feedback: charges, prices, stocks charges, transaction charges, delivery charges,

Brokerage: Rs.20 or 0.05%
of the order value (whichever is lower)

0.00325% (NSE) or

Transaction Charges.answerText:
In intraday trading, each open position should be squared off by 3:10 PM. 

If itâ€™s an auto square-off, there will be a charge of Rs.50 + GST per position. 

Hence, we recommend planning the square-off for your open intraday positions well in advance.
Transaction Charges.feedback: charges, prices, stocks charges, transaction charges, GST, maintenance charges, intraday charges, delivery charges, dp charges, square off charges, account opening charges, turnover, stamp duty,

Transaction Charges.questionTitle: What are DP charges (depository participant charges)?
Transaction Charges.answerText:
DP charges or Depository Participant charges are charged by the depository (CDSL). 

DP charges when buying: Rs 0. 

DP charges when selling: Rs 13.5 + GST per ISIN (company stock or ETF) per day, regardless of quantity sold.
Transaction Charges.feedback: charges, prices, stocks charges, transaction charges, GST, maintenance charges, intraday charges, delivery charges, dp charges, square off charges, account opening charges, turnover, stamp duty,

Regulatory Charges.answerHtml: It is charged by the government for the contract note, applicable on buy orders only. For equity delivery: 0.015% For equity intraday: 0.003%
Regulatory Charges.feedback: charges, prices, stocks charges, transaction charges, stamp duty,

Regulatory Charges.answerHtml:
STT stands for Securities Transaction Tax. It is charged by the government when you transact on the exchanges.

For equity delivery: 0.1% of order amount
For equity intraday: 0.025% of order amount
Regulatory Charges.feedback: charges, prices, stocks charges, transaction charges, securities transaction tax

Regulatory Charges.questionTitle: What are transaction charges by exchange?
Regulatory Charges.answerHtml: Transaction charges are charges applicable for trading on the exchanges. BSE: 0.003% of ordar amount NSE: 0.00325% of order amount. It is applicable for both buy and sell orders.
Regulatory Charges.feedback: charges, prices, stocks charges, transaction charges, GST, maintenance charges, intraday charges, delivery charges, dp charges, square off charges, account opening charges, turnover, stamp duty,

Regulatory Charges.answerHtml: For regulating the market, SEBI charges 0.00005% of the turnover.
Regulatory Charges.feedback: charges, prices, stocks charges, transaction charges, SEBI charges

Regulatory Charges.answerHtml: The rate of GST applicable is 18% of the amount wherever applicable.
Regulatory Charges.feedback: charges, prices, stocks charges, transaction charges, GST, maintenance charges, intraday charges, delivery charges, dp charges, square off charges, account opening charges, turnover, stamp duty,

Regulatory Charges.questionTitle: My issue is not listed here.
Regulatory Charges.answerText: You can try searching for your issue. Alternatively you can raise a ticket with us. Our Customer Support champs will help you out in no time!
